DellFirmwareImageHash.description: This resource contains information about a FirmwareImageHash Instance.
DellFirmwareImageHash.longDescription: This resource represents a FirmwareImageHash Instance with its details.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

HashAlgorithm.description: The Hash Algorithm used to generate hash.
HashAlgorithm.longDescription: This property shall represent the cryptographic hash function/algorithm used to generate Hash value of given FirmwareImage. For FirmwareImageHash, supported values are SHA256, SHA384, SHA512 only.

HashValue.description: The Hash value of a FirmwareImage reported by BIOS.
HashValue.longDescription: This property shall represent the Hash of a FirmwareImage, which can be generated from cryptographic hash function/algorithm  mentioned in HashAlgorithm.

enumDescriptions.SHA256: SHA256 cryptographic hash function used to generate Hash value of given FirmwareImage.
enumDescriptions.SHA384: SHA384 cryptographic hash function used to generate Hash value of given FirmwareImage.
enumDescriptions.SHA512: SHA512 cryptographic hash function used to generate Hash value of given FirmwareImage.
enumDescriptions.Unknown: Unknown cryptographic hash function used to generate Hash value of given FirmwareImage.

title: #DellFirmwareImageHash.v1_0_0.DellFirmwareImageHash
